description: This file defines the AppUser class, representing an authenticated user within the app, including methods for JSON serialization/deserialization and a role-based getter.

classes.name: AppUser
classes.description: Represents an authenticated user with properties like id, name, email, role, and methods for JSON conversion and role checking.

methods.name: AppUser.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create an AppUser instance from JSON data.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the AppUser instance into JSON format.
